Name: Relaxicon
About the game: Relaxicon helps you learn English and improve your vocabulary in a meditative way. Combine letters into words to get their definitions, score points, unlock over 70 types of challenges and enjoy original atmospheric background music and in-tune sound effects for a relaxing meditation. Use mouse or keyboard to combine words together. Press Enter to score the word and get a definition. If you made a mistake, use backspace to remove the last letter and continue typing the correct word. Or press delete to break the whole word. When you have a challenge, press space to toggle the description. Game contains over 130000 English word definitions! Soundtrack consists of 9 original ambient pieces , and all sound effects were built specifically in tune with soundtrack, for maximum relaxation and ear pleasure. Headphones are highly recommended.
